name: Autumn-Park
tagline: My first journey into the world of Java.
body:
##Game Overview
2D tile-based casual game; collect treasure as you explore the forest. Navigate the land and overcome obstacles to harvest all of the mushrooms. Solve puzzles to collect the rare garnets. Be sure to talk to everyone if you want a shot at claiming the rewards on offer.

##Controls
* Arrow Keys - player movement / menu navigation
* Spacebar - perform action / select option
* Enter - pause menu

![Title Menu](http://i937.photobucket.com/albums/ad215/TwistedKinaesthetix/ScreenshotTitle_zps7fe7b1e9.png)

## Learning
* [CodeNMore](https://www.youtube.com/user/CodeNMore)
* [Home and Learn](http://www.homeandlearn.co.uk/java/)

## Resources
* Famitsu Sprites ([male](http://www.famitsu.com/freegame/tool/chibi/index1.html) / [female](http://www.famitsu.com/freegame/tool/chibi/index2.html))
* [Flaming Text](http://flamingtext.co.uk/) Logo Site

![Character Select Screen](http://i937.photobucket.com/albums/ad215/TwistedKinaesthetix/ScreenshotCharacterSelect_zpsfda2b86a.png)

## References
* Audio class from [Diamond Hunter](http://3d56.com/diamond-hunter-java-2d-game-with-source-code/) game

## Project Details
I wrote a Hello World java program and started learning the basics on 09/01/2015.
